title: No Friendly Error Message for Empty Series
description: When there is no data for a series, the software should display a friendly error message to alert the user.
OB: When there is no data for a series, the software does not provide a friendly error message to inform the user.
EB: The expected behavior is that when there is no data for a series, the software should display a friendly error message to remind the user of the empty series.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a chart.
2. Set the data definition for the chart.
3. Select a column that does not contain any data.
